for_sales.sales_text: 9 ton 31' gaff yacht kept in original condition. Original dB Handy Billy Thornycroft engine. Boat rebuilt. 2017. Full set of sails by Jekylls.

boat.full_description:
Built as a Broads Yacht in 1936 she remained in Yarmouth under her original ownership until 1961 when she was sold north, first to Selby then Hull. She underwent a refit to return her to seaworthy condition in the 1990s but retained her original DB HandyBilly Thornycroft engine as it was in good condition. She retains the same engine in 2019.

She has been equally loyal to her sailmaker, with sails by Jekylls in all records.

Broads registration 424D
boat.name: Syrinx

ownerships.name: Cowley,Melvyn J, D J & R G

boat.short_description: One of 3 Broads Yachts built to the same design by W.S.Parker on Oulton Broad.
